title: Overflowing garbage on Road 21
description: Garbage has not been collected for 5 days, creating a bad smell and health risk.

title: Illegal construction blocking footpath
description: Half of the footpath is blocked by construction materials, making it hard for pedestrians.

title: Broken streetlight near park
description: The streetlight in front of the park has been broken for two weeks, causing darkness at night.

title: Severe road damage near bus stand
description: Large potholes on the main road are causing traffic jams and vehicle damage.

title: Uncollected garbage near school
description: Garbage near the local school gate has not been collected for a week, attracting flies.

title: Unauthorized shop on footpath
description: A small shop has been built illegally on the footpath, blocking public movement.

title: Broken bench in public park
description: Several benches in the park are damaged and unsafe for sitting.

title: Damaged road near railway crossing
description: The road near the railway crossing has cracks and potholes due to heavy trucks.

title: Garbage overflow at market area
description: Dustbins in the market area are overflowing, spreading bad odor.

title: Cracked road after rainfall
description: Heavy rainfall has caused cracks on the main road, making it unsafe for vehicles.
